name: CustomProfiles
description: My first mod to geode, a port for the original CustomProfiles now available with new features!

Disable-info-button.name: Disable-info-button
Disable-info-button.description: This hide the info button from profile

Round-corners.name: Round-corners
Round-corners.description: Profiles will now have round corners

Square-corners.name: Square-corners
Square-corners.description: Profiles will now have square corners

No-corners.name: No-corners
No-corners.description: The profiles will now not have squares

Animate-colors.name: Animate-colors
Animate-colors.description: You will have an animation in the colors of your profile

Invert-Colors.name: Invert-Colors
Invert-Colors.description: The colors of the gradient will be shown inverted

Normal-colors.name: Normal-colors
Normal-colors.description: The gradient will be displayed in the normal order

issues.info: Post your issues on the <cp>Issue tracking repository</c>.
